div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1435 Cilicia, between Tarsus and Adana, (1063) 1848 Burial: c. 115 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 200 AR Antiochus VII: 7 tetradr. (Antiocheia 3, Damascus 3, Tarsus 1) Demetrius II (2nd reign): 11 tetradr. (An- tiocheia 2, Damascus 1, Tarsus 5, Seleuceia ad Calycadnum 1, unc. mints 2) Cleopatra and Antiochus VIII: 19 tetradr. (Antiocheia 5, Sidon 1, Ace 8, Da- mascus 5) Antiochus VIII: 101 tetradr. (Antiocheia 25, Sidon 4, Ace 22, Damascus 23, Tarsus 22, unc. mints 5) Disposition: dispersed; 60+ melted. Sothe- by, July 12, 1852, nos. 378-417 Borrell, NC 1852-3, pp. 40-57, illus.
